text: Xa ke sele (bephantsele) ukuzalisekisa ixesha elo nisengabagcina ngemvisiswano entle kungenjalo nahlukane nabo ngesihle. Nize namangqina amabini angamadoda angamalungisa phakathi kwenu, nimisele ubungqina obamkelekileyo kuAllâh. Oko kuyalelwa lowo ukholwayo kuAllâh nakwiMini yokuGqibela. Ke kaloku lowo umoyikayo uAllâh, Uya kumenzela indlela
